abstract: Michael Mayo, the prominent bank analyst who recently left Deutsche Bank to join a unit of Calyon, initiated coverage of 11 large banks in the United States, assigning all of them “underperform” or “sell” ratings.

lead_paragraph: Update | 12:09 p.m.  Mike Mayo is back, and the prominent banking analyst sounds more bearish than ever.

headline.main: Bank Analyst Sees Depression-Size Loan Losses
